												Visually it looks great and it's good to see some officially licenced bikes modelled well. Although I'm not entirely sure how KTM would feel about their roaring twin sounding like a dodgy arcade version of a 4 cylinder 600cc screamer. Speaking of which, the noise from the bikes will drive you batshit crazy within 20 mins and a lack of ingame music doesn't help, recommend turning sound down and draining it out with your favourite tunes. If you enjoy games that don't try to hold your hand then this is the game for you! not only will it not hold your hand, it won't even tell you what the hell you should be doing. 1.5h in and the only thing that seems to be unlocked are the first 3 races in the Beginners tournament that I have already done 3 times each. The ability to change what bike you're riding during the race not only negates the need for the stupid rough area's that restrict the sports bikes to about 85kph and allows the cruisers to excel, but it removes what little immersion the game barely offered in the first place and just feels a little silly. I was hoping to get a slightly more arcade handling version of Tourist trophy, what I got was a cheesy arcade racer from the 90's, even if it has been wrapped into a fairly pretty exterior.The cost is inexplicably excessive, and I will definitely be pursuing a refund.If you see this on a steam sale for $2.99 then sure, give it a go, why not, you won't get 2 hours of average entertainment for that much anywhere else.3/10

												I don't usually bother reviewing games, but this is a special case.....This game is one of - if not, the worst racing game I have ever played (check my profile, I pretty much only play racing games).At least Motorama - my next least favourite game, didn't constantly stop working for no reason at all - see below.In getting the multiplayer achievements done, I have encountered the following: - Numerous crashes on the start / autosave screen when first starting the game. - Numerous crashes to desktop during races. - BSOD - been a while since encountered one of those - so thanks Kylotonn for that. - Controller (official X360 wireless controller with official X360 wireless receiver) becoming non responsive during races and then starting again all on it's own.The actual gameplay: - The steering of the bikes is shocking (but considering their other game at the time was Truck Racer it is about the same level of realism, none). - Why bother having a choice of three bikes that are switchable during the actual race when they are all terrible to actually use? - Jumps, glowing gates, speed cameras and dirt / rough road sections (that slow bikes right down)..... why bother. - The AI is easily beatenDon't spend money on this game.
